What about bacterial identification?

Bacteria ferment carbohydrates in patterns characteristic of their genus and species, so detection of fermentation products is commonly used in bacterial identification. What about viral infections?

The diagnosis of infectious diseases depends on the type of infection. Doctors may use a variety of tests, including blood tests, imaging tests, and cultures of body fluids or tissues.

I see. How can we prevent the spread of infectious diseases?
